instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-2914: What is 820-2914? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.U5701: What is U5701? this is the keyboard controller chip that takes the keyboard and trackpad input and turns it into a USB device signal for the machine to process. If replacing a keyboard doesnâ€™t fix an issue with keys not typing, check all traces between keyboard connector and this IC. This chip has programming so it must be replaced from a similar, ideally identical board. .

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no trackpad and no keyboard usb keyboard an trackpad works
threads.message:
Hi. I have <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no trackpad and no keyboard. Usb keyboard an trackpad works.  Also laptop powering up from power button. No water damaged. This laptop come with faulty gpu, I replaced for new one also reballed ram blocks on another side of board under gpu. Now laptop powering and going to osx.

J5713 voltage check:
pin 30 : 3.324v
pin  4 : 3.493v
pin 5 : 3.479v

am not sure why is no working. anybody had this problem b4 ?

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no trackpad and no keyboard usb keyboard an trackpad works
threads.message: Do both USB ports work, or just one of them? sdcard slot/bluetooth working?

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no trackpad and no keyboard usb keyboard an trackpad works
threads.message: yes two usb works no problem and bluetooth also works

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no trackpad and no keyboard usb keyboard an trackpad works
threads.message: Either bad trackpad & trackpad cable or bad <CHIP>U5701</CHIP>. Check <RESISTOR>R5704</RESISTOR> to make sure 3.3v is present on both sides. Keyboard won't work if trackpad is bad on this model in my experience.

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no trackpad and no keyboard usb keyboard an trackpad works
threads.message: trackpad cable broken. somebody was here b4 me. i will replace it and see if it works. thx for help m8

threads.title: [SOLVED] <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-2914</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b no trackpad and no keyboard usb keyboard an trackpad works
threads.message: ok. bought new trackpad cable and works :) happy days , thanks for help m8
